item.title: #04 - Everything not saved will be lost
item.description:
Nix, NixOS and nixpkgs are all moving ahead at good speed. The 17.03 milestone is more than 50% complete, and we merged 144 pull requests for nixpkgs just in the last seven days.

News

  • The NixOS 17.03 beta has been announced.
  • We now allow packages to be marked …

item.title: #03 - Better Late Than Never
item.description:
Another two weeks have passed and it is time for our summary.

A new section Questions was added to the newsletter. The intention for this new section is that it is going to expose some of the questions that happen in the past. We hope that none of the questions …

item.title: #02 - Here we go
item.description:
Let us together review what happened in NixOS community in last 2 weeks. We are always looking to improve.

Let us know how we can do better.

News

  • Many of you are not aware, but you can easily subscribe and help triage tickets and pull requests in NixOS/nixpkgs repository …
item.dc:creator: NixOS Weekly Team

item.title: #01 - We need to start somewhere
item.description:
Welcome to the first edition of NixOS weekly. We will do our best to release this newsletter every second week. If there is something you think we could improve, please let us know.

News

  • NixOS 17.03 release manager is Robin Gloster. Thank you and we are looking to help …
